Description: Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhouse apartment available between Kendall/MIT and Central Square in Cambridge! Living room 3-story high ceiling and is made cozy by a wood-burning stove. Central AC. Open layout to dining room and kitchen, which includes dishwasher, disposal and microwave. Front garden and back patio with grill. 3-minute walk to great restaurants, bars and the movie theater at One Kendall Square, 12-minute walk to the Red Line at Kendall/MIT or Shaw's Supermarket, 15-minute walk to Central or Inman Square. Available July 1st or sooner: call today inquire!
